ygData.subject: Butcher Knife and mino caves
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all, Anyone know what quest the Butcher Knife is for?  It was looted off the corpse of the racekilling NPC Gnome...  The stats on the dagger are no better
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all,

Anyone know what quest the Butcher Knife is for? It was looted off the
corpse of the racekilling NPC Gnome... The stats on the dagger are no
better than one you'd fish up but it is a LORE ITEM so I'm guessing its
part of one of those 'Bring proof you killed so-and-so for your reward'
type deals.

Also, as for looking for more tinkering books, has anyone checked the Mino
caves? There are Gnomes that walk around killstealing minos, has anyone
ever tried right-clicking on them to attempt to buy? Or trying to hail
them for a quest? AFAIK, there are several Gnomes in the caves but I
haven't searched much, mainly because I'm in the Karanas area :P Anyone
that knows anything about the NPCs in the cave or want to check it out?

-Luke

EQ tinkering guide web site:
http://home1.gte.net/jlukas/eq/tinker.htm

PS: Sort of working on improving the site a bit, not much new news to add
though. BTW, trying to make bows using tinker-made cams is BUGGED. Won't
work. Period. That's the latest word from GMs.
